short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Worder: online English dictionary with more than 100,000 English words, phrasal verbs and idioms.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Worder is an online English dictionary with more than 100,000 English words, phrasal verbs and idioms.
The extension allows users to find words in our vocabulary and provide access to meaning and descriptions for these English words.
